code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL||'http://localhost:8081';const getAuthHeaders=token=>({headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});export const getAllPosts=async token=>{try{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/posts"),getAuthHeaders(token));return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response;console.error('Error fetching all posts:',((_error$response=error.response)===null||_error$response===void 0?void 0:_error$response.data)||error.message);throw error;}};export const createPost=async(message,token)=>{try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/posts"),{message},getAuthHeaders(token));return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response2;console.error('Error creating post:',((_error$response2=error.response)===null||_error$response2===void 0?void 0:_error$response2.data)||error.message);throw error;}};export const likePost=async(postId,token)=>{try{const response=await axios.post("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/posts/").concat(postId,"/like"),{},getAuthHeaders(token));return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response3;console.error('Error liking post:',((_error$response3=error.response)===null||_error$response3===void 0?void 0:_error$response3.data)||error.message);throw error;}};export const unlikePost=async(postId,token)=>{try{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(API_BASE_URL,"/posts/").concat(postId,"/like"),getAuthHeaders(token));return response.data;}catch(error){var _error$response4;console.error('Error unliking post:',((_error$response4=error.response)===null||_error$response4===void 0?void 0:_error$response4.data)||error.message);throw error;}};
